short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Previously viewed comments are colored gray.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically detects which comments you have already seen and turns them gray. This is useful if you want to quickly catch up on a thread without having to wade through all of the comments you have already read. Better than sorting by "new"!

Source is available to browse at the link.

I have no affiliation with Reddit's parent company, Advance Publications, Inc (API). This extension is not endorsed by API.
